MSstrings is a package that will read in Spectronaut-formatted peptides with or without protein modifications and display them nicely.

## Installation

MSstrings can be installed from GitHub using the following command:

```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github('BIFX545-26/msstrings-johnsonra')
```

## Example

This package comes with a sample data set, which we import and display below.

```{r}
library(MSstrings)

data("MSfrags")
parse_mods(MSfrags)
```
